sentences.en: After his death his sister sorted through his ( personal ) belongings.
sentences.cn: 他死后,他妹妹整理了他的 ( 私人 ) 财物.

sentences.en: an insurance policy that covers your personal belongings
sentences.cn: 一张承保个人财物的保单

sentences.en: Ask them to send you information on how to assess the value of your belongings.
sentences.cn: 让他们把怎样评估你的财产价值的资料寄来。

sentences.en: For a small consideration my friend will help you move your belongings to your new house.
sentences.cn: 给少量的报酬,我的朋友就会帮你把东西搬到你的新居去.

sentences.en: He was identified only by his uniform and personal belongings.
sentences.cn: 他的身份只是通过制服和个人财物确定了下来。

sentences.en: He was told to pack up all of his letters and personal belongings.
sentences.cn: 他被告知收拾好自己所有的信件和私人物品.

sentences.en: Her belongings clutter up my bedroom.
sentences.cn: 她的东西乱七八糟堆满在我臥室里.

sentences.en: I collected my belongings and left.
sentences.cn: 我收拾好随身物品就离开了。

sentences.en: I put a few personal belongings in a bag.
sentences.cn: 我把几件私人物品装进包中.

sentences.en: I rescued my belongings from the flood.
sentences.cn: 我把财物抢救出来,免遭洪水淹没.

sentences.en: insurance of property and personal belongings
sentences.cn: 不动产和个人财物保险

sentences.en: The police had come to my house and impounded all my belongings.
sentences.cn: 警察曾到我家没收了我所有的财物.

sentences.en: They despoiled the villagers of their belongings.
sentences.cn: 他们夺走了村民的财物.

sentences.en: They dumped his belongings unceremoniously on the floor.
sentences.cn: 他们粗暴地把他的物品摔到地板上。

sentences.en: We automatically insure your belongings against fire and theft.
sentences.cn: 我们自动为您的财产上失窃险和火灾险。

sentences.en: Your personal belongings are not dutiable.

trans.tran_en: the things you own, especially things that you can carry with you
